name: Butta Drop Refill Whipped Oil Body Cream with Tropical Oils + Shea Butter
categories: Bath & Body, Body Moisturizers, Body Lotions & Body Oils
about: What it is: A thick, rich, body moisturizer that delivers deep hydration in a nourishing whipped oil cream loaded with rich butters and tropical oils...Highlighted Ingredients:.- 7 Luxurious Oils (Kalahari Melon, Sorrel, Baobab, Sunflower, Rice Bran, Coconut, Jojoba): Help nourish skin and deliver luminosity..- Shea Butter: Helps to visibly condition and repair the moisture barrier..- Glycerin: Provides hydration, comfort, and sheen...Ingredient Callouts: This product is gluten-free, cruelty-free, vegan, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This clean, refillable body moisturizer features nearly 25 percent rich butters and seven conditioning oils for long-lasting hydration and a healthy-looking sheen. Antioxidant and vitamin C-packed cherry extract restores vibrancy, while glycerin locks in moisture...Fragrance Description:.Fenty Fresh: Infused with a light, fresh + fruity blend of bergamot, jasmine + white orchid scent and original, glossy sheen.Fenty Fresh Shimmering: Infused with a light, fresh + fruity blend of bergamot, jasmine + white orchid scent and soft, gold shimmer.Warm Cinnamon Shimmering: Infused with a deliciously warm, cinnamon-inspired scent and soft, gold shimmer..Clinical Results:¬†In a 4-week clinical study on 55 women:.Instantly: Hydrates and reduces visible dryness.After one week:.- 100% agree it conditions and nourishes skin and restores skin's suppleness.- 98% agree it leaves skin luminous.- 96% agree it restores skin‚Äôs vibrancy.- Boosts elasticity by 23%.Over time:.-Renews dull, flaky skin.-Envelops skin with moisture.-Reveals smoother, softer skin.-Gives skin a supple bounce.- 30 % boost in elasticity in 4 weeks...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -7 Luxe Oils: Help nourish skin and deliver a healthy sheen..-Shea Butter: Nourish and condition; rich in essential fatty acids and antioxidants..-Glycerin: A supple humectant that binds and locks in moisture...Aqua/Water/Eau, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Propanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Cetearyl Olivate, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Seed Oil, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Adansonia Digitata Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Plumeria Acutifolia Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Olivate, Polysorbate 60, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ethyl Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tromethamine, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Parfum/Fragrance, Cinnamal, Coumarin...The list of ingredients is subject to change. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply all over body once a day..-To remove the refill, just press up from the bottom inner ring to pop it out...Recycling Instructions:.-The outer sleeve is recyclable. .-When you‚Äôre done, recycle the inner container and refill.

reviews.review_title: amazing at keeping skin moisturized and soft
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this body cream! I used it during my recoveries from two rounds of plastic surgery earlier this year‚Äîa tummy tuck, some lipo 360, a breast lift, fat transfer, and BBL‚Äî all in all, a ton of body contouring, and it was nothing short of a lifesaver. While I obviously didn‚Äôt use it on surgical wounds, it became an essential part of my routine for managing the intense swelling that comes with recovery on the lower half of my body while I used the lighter fenty line lotion on the upper half of my body (the lotion absorbs a little faster over sensitive adjacent regions during the lipo burning feeling, also highly recommended).   Swelling during recovery can really strain your skin, leading to dryness, irritation, and even fissures. This cream kept my skin thoroughly moisturized, soft, and resilient, even during the most challenging phases. It absorbed beautifully without feeling greasy, and I truly believe it helped prevent any skin issues while my body was under so much pressure.  If you‚Äôre undergoing a similar procedure, or if you simply need a deeply hydrating, skin-loving product, I can‚Äôt recommend this enough. It made all the difference in my recovery and left my skin feeling amazing. A must-have!

reviews.review_title: Great for this time of year
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely fell in love with the Cinnamon scent from last year. My skin was so super soft after use. The scent was not overpowering, and the body cream was not overly thick. Perfect for my skin. I stretched the body cream as long as I could, seeing as it was regularly sold out last year. I was a little disappointed that they decided to only make a tiny version this year, and brought out Toasted Marshmellow. I'm not sure if some have had a bad batch, or what? Mine does not smell like play-doh, or anything of the sort. What the scent reminds me of, is the Toasted Marshmellow from Bath and Body Works. I really do like this Toasted Marshmellow scent. It's not overpowering, the formula seems to be as shimmery as last year. I hope to stock up on this before it disappears.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample with a previous order and immediately bought the full size. It's smooth, buttery, hydrating, and the scent is not overpowering at all, but it is light and fresh. It's a thick consistency and makes my skin glow and accentuates my tan. The only reason it's 4 stars is because it's pricey. I will probably repurchase, but if I were on a budget I couldn't. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and like a thick lotion all year round. I was really disappointed that this lotion is so full of silicones and does not sink in. If you use too much it is really oily and got all over my clothes (and thankfully washed out) but when I used any amount it did not sink in and just sat on my skin. It has a synthetic sweet smell that seems light but I could smell it throughout the day. I‚Äôm really disappointed in this lotion and will hold onto it for the winter hoping that it might be moisturizing and sink in for my super dry winter skin.

reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this but in contrast to most other reviews..this is not a ‚Äúoh-em-g‚Äù kind of product. It is nothing special..smell and consistency really is like a hair conditioning mask and my skin felt sticky and tacky afterwards. On a positive note..my husband loved the smell on me and described it as ‚Äúfresh‚Äù. It makes a good moisturizer for after shaving legs but would likely not repurchase.
